round_best: Develop a hybrid AI system that combines graph neural networks (GNN) with generative adversarial networks (GAN) specifically tailored for high-content perturbation experiments. The GNN would model the complex interactions between various biological molecules and pathways, effectively capturing the semantic depth of biological data. Concurrently, the GAN component would generate synthetic biological data that reinforce rare or underrepresented perturbation effects, thereby reducing experimental costs and enhancing the scale of data for better training and predictive accuracy in biological analysis.
